body:
`ERelu.cuda` is not called because `.cuda()` just recurses over all it's children and looks for `Parameter` objects, and calls `.cuda()` on them.
Here's the relevant bits:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/module.py#L123-L139
